title: Story2Board: Training-Free Storyboard Generation
description: Generate expressive storyboards from natural language using FLUX.1-dev with custom attention mechanisms for character consistency and narrative diversity

defaults.SUBJECT: mystical fox with shimmering fur
defaults.REF_PANEL_PROMPT: standing on a moonlit forest path
defaults.PANEL_PROMPTS: leaping over a sparkling stream,perched on an ancient stone

defaults.SUBJECT: elegant dragon
defaults.REF_PANEL_PROMPT: soaring above misty mountains at dawn
defaults.PANEL_PROMPTS: diving through cloud formations,landing on castle towers

input.name: Main Subject
input.description: The main character or subject for the storyboard (e.g., 'mystical fox with golden fur')

input.name: Reference Panel Prompt
input.description: Description for the reference (top) panel that establishes the character
input.default: standing in a colorful garden with blooming flowers

input.name: Panel Prompts
input.description: Comma-separated prompts for additional panels (e.g., 'waving hello,picking flowers,dancing in sunlight')
input.default: waving hello to butterflies,picking bright red flowers

input.name: Guidance Scale
input.description: Classifier-free guidance scale (higher = closer to prompt, lower = more diverse)

input.name: Diffusion Steps
input.description: Number of denoising steps (more steps = higher quality, longer generation time)

input.name: Random Seed
input.description: Random seed for reproducible results (leave empty for random)

input.name: RAVM Mixing Coefficient
input.description: Reciprocal Attention Value Mixing strength (0.0-1.0, higher = more consistency)

input.name: Use Same Noise
input.description: Use same initial noise for all panels (true/false)
